description: Explore how License-Token simplifies open source compliance by automating the process, reducing legal risks, and enabling efficient governance. Understand the challenges of open-source licensing and discover the benefits of integrating License-Token into your software development practices.
keywords: License-Token, open source compliance, open-source software, OSS, MIT License, Apache 2.0, GNU General Public License, machine learning, blockchain, software development, digital artefacts, compliance verification
title: License-Token: Streamlining Open Source Compliance
